<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/53148</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>53148</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_390</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_390</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Polinomios</string>
            <string language="en">Polynomials</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Polynome</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Polynômes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Polynomials</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Polinomi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πολυώνυμα</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones los polinomios y sus operaciones. Se estudian sus operaciones, incluyendo la regla de Ruffini y el teorema del Resto para utilizarlo en la factorización de polinomios.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to study polynomials and how to operate with them, including Ruffini's rule and the polynomial remainder theorem, which are used to factorise polynomials.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">operaciones</string>
            <string language="en">operations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">polinomio</string>
            <string language="en">polynomial</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">factorización</string>
            <string language="en">factorisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">regla de Ruffini</string>
            <string language="en">Ruffini's rule</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">teorema del Resto</string>
            <string language="en">polynomial remainder theorem</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, Polynome zu studieren und wie man mit ihnen, 
einschließlich Richtlinie Ruffinis und das polynomische Resttheorem 
funktioniert, die verwendet werden, um Polynome zu faktorisieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'étudier des polynômes et comment fonctionner avec eux,
y compris la règle de Ruffini et le théorème polynôme de reste, 
qui sont employés pour factoriser des polynômes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações estudar 
polynomials e como operar-se com eles, including a régua de Ruffini e
o theorem polynomial do restante, que são usados factorise 
polynomials.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
studiare i polinomi e come funzionare con loro, compreso la regola del
Ruffini ed il teorema polinomiale di resto, che sono usati per 
scomporre i polinomi in fattori.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
στα πολυώνυμα μελέτης και πώς να λειτουργήσει με τους, 
συμπεριλαμβανομένου του κανόνα Ruffini και του πολυωνυμικού 
θεωρήματος υπολοίπου, οι οποίοι χρησιμοποιούνται για να 
παραγοντοποιήσουν τα πολυώνυμα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Operationen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">polynomisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Faktorisierung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Richtlinie Ruffinis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">polynomisches Resttheorem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">exécutions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">polynôme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">factorisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La règle de Ruffini</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">théorème polynôme de reste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">operações</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">polynomial</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">factorisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Régua de Ruffini</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">theorem polynomial do restante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">funzionamenti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">polinomiale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scomposizione in fattori</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Regola del Ruffini</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">teorema polinomiale di resto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διαδικασίες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πολυωνυμικός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παραγοντοποίηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κανόνας Ruffini</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πολυωνυμικό θεώρημα υπολοίπου</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
